segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, the layout is straightforward with cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, holding a plate and towel methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs, basin fills, water spills over the edge steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms on the floor, wetting the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her right foot touches the water, but her expression stays calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes sit on the counter to her right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above shows a garden path with bushes and fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs stool in front of open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tilts slightly, his body extended toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand inside the jar, the other grips a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands nearby, arm raised palm up toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Lower cabinets have simple doors with pulls, now damp from water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overall scene depicts routine interrupted by subtle disruptions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light from outside highlights the domestic elements clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR
